whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Business
whatsapp.description: Connect your WhatsApp number to automate bookings and reminders
whatsapp.connectDescription: Connect your WhatsApp Business account with one click. You just need to authorize permissions in Meta and we'll handle the rest.
whatsapp.supportAgentDescription: Allow your customers to connect with a human agent when they press "Help"
whatsapp.supportAgentPhoneHint: WhatsApp number of the agent who will receive requests (E.164 format, e.g.: 5491170590570)
whatsapp.botPersonalizationDescription: Customize the messages that the WhatsApp bot sends to your customers. Use {name} to replace the customer's name.
whatsapp.greetingHint: Message that appears when the customer writes 'hello' for the first time
whatsapp.greetingWithNameHint: Message when the customer is already registered. Use {name} for the name
whatsapp.welcomeMessageHint: Text that appears in the bot's main menu
whatsapp.welcomeFullMessageHint: Longer and more personalized message that appears in the main menu. You can use {name} to include the customer's name. If empty, the short welcome message will be used.
whatsapp.nameRequestHint: Message to ask the new customer for their name
whatsapp.branchSelectionHint: Message when there are multiple branches available
whatsapp.serviceSelectionHeaderHint: Title when showing the service list
whatsapp.instructorSelectionBodyHint: Text when showing the list of professionals/instructors
whatsapp.saveChangesNote: Changes will be saved together with the rest of the configuration using the "Save Changes" button above

config.title: Configuration
config.businessNameHint: The business name cannot be changed
config.arcaDescription: Configure the necessary data to issue electronic invoices with ARCA

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Activity summary and real-time metrics
dashboard.incomeWillAppear: Income will appear when you have completed appointments
dashboard.servicesWillAppear: Services will appear when you have scheduled appointments

customers.title: Customers
customers.name: Name
customers.customersWillAppear: Customers will appear here when you create appointments or they register

hero.title: Manage Your Business
hero.subtitle: Complete ERP system to manage appointments, inventory, invoicing and more. With online payments, automatic notifications and integrated WhatsApp bot.
hero.trial: ✓ 14-day free trial • ✓ No credit card • ✓ Cancel anytime

features.title: Everything you need in one place
features.subtitle: Powerful tools designed to grow your business

appointments.title: Appointment Management
appointments.description: Intuitive calendar to manage appointments, schedules and availability of your professionals and services.

customers.title: Customer Base
customers.description: Manage your customer base with complete history of services and preferences.

payments.title: Mercado Pago Payments
payments.description: Accept deposits and online payments securely with full Mercado Pago integration.

notifications.title: Automatic Notifications
notifications.description: Automatic WhatsApp reminders to reduce no-shows and improve attendance.

whatsapp.title: Integrated WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Smart bot that allows your customers to schedule appointments directly via WhatsApp.

security.title: Secure and Reliable
security.description: Data protected with enterprise-level security and automatic backups.

pricing.title: Plans that fit your business
pricing.subtitle: Choose the perfect plan for your business. All include free trial.
pricing.trialNote: All plans include 14-day free trial. No credit card required.

features.payments: Payments and deposits with Mercado Pago

stats.title: Reliable and robust system
stats.subtitle: Enterprise-level technology within reach of your business

availability.label: Availability
availability.description: For your customers and your business

useCases.title: Ideal for any service business
useCases.subtitle: From small startups to companies with multiple branches

appointments.title: Appointment Services
appointments.description: Ideal for businesses that work with appointments: salons, barbershops, spas, beauty centers, clinics and more.

teams.title: Team Services
teams.description: Manage multiple professionals, schedules, availability and resource allocation in real time.

payments.title: Businesses with Online Payments
payments.description: Accept deposits, advance payments and recurring memberships integrated with Mercado Pago.

automation.title: Automated Communication
automation.description: Automatic reminders, confirmations and follow-up via WhatsApp without manual intervention.

invoicing.title: Electronic Invoicing
invoicing.description: Integrated AFIP/ARCA invoicing, inventory control, financial reports and accounting management.

branches.title: Multiple Branches
branches.description: Manage multiple locations from a single system with centralized control and consolidated reports.

fast.title: Fast Services
fast.description: For businesses that need agility: instant bookings, quick check-in and efficient management.

regulated.title: Regulated Businesses
regulated.description: Regulatory compliance, traceability, automatic backups and enterprise data security.

cta.title: Ready to transform your business?
cta.subtitle: Start your free trial today. No credit card, no commitment.

footer.description: ERP management system for any service business. Appointments, inventory, invoicing, memberships and more.

routines.title: Workout Routines
routines.manageAndAssign: Manage and assign workout routines to your customers
routines.searchPlaceholder: Search routines by name, description or difficulty…
routines.routinesWillAppear: Routines will appear here when created
routines.noExercises: No exercises. Click "Add exercise" to get started.
routines.searchCustomer: Search customer by name or phone...
routines.noCustomersFound: No customers found with that criteria
routines.importDocument: The document must contain the routine name, exercises with sets and repetitions
routines.autoDetect: The system will automatically detect: name, exercises, sets, repetitions, rest and sections.
routines.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the routine "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.
routines.uploadWordFile: Upload a Word (.docx) file with a routine. The system will try to automatically extract the routine information.
